cards.rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, for as long as this enchantment remains on the battlefield, you become a legendary Avatar creature with “Your power and toughness are each equal to your life total.”
When you leave the battlefield, sacrifice this enchantment.
Counter target Un-spell. [i](An un-spell is a silver-bordered or acorn spell.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“‘Curse of the Fire Penguin?' Are you even listening to yourself?”[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Starfall[/i] — Whenever a nontoken permanent you control enters, if the night sky is visible in its art, create a 1/1 white and blue Star enchantment creature token with flying.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Do you like these constellations? I made them myself!”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Each nontoken, nonland, noncreature permanent you control is an Incarnation creature in addition to its other types and has base power and toughness equal to its mana value. The same is true for noncreature permanent spells you control and noncreature, nonland permanent cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
Protection from non-Un
Whenever you cast an Un-spell from your hand, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland Un-card with lesser mana value. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
